Mayor
=====

Carol K. McCutcheon
-------------------

Council Member McCutcheon was elected to her third term as Single Member District 4 in 2021. She and her husband, Joe, have lived in Sugar Land since 1993. Council Member McCutcheon is known for her civic and community involvement, and has extensive experience as a reservoir engineer in the exploration and production of oil and gas.

June 2025 - May 2028

* City Compensation Committee
  + Member
* City Economic Development Committee
  + Member
* City Finance/Audit Committee
  + Past Member
* Sugar Land Development Corporation (SLDC)
  + Past President
* Tax Increment Reinvestment Zone Number Four (TIRZ 4)
  + Past Member
* City Multi-Cultural Program Task Force
  + Member
* City Land Use Advisory Committee
  + Member 2016-2017
* City Charter Review Commission
  + Member 2003
* Fort Bend Leadership Forum
  + Class of 1995
* Sugar Land Citizens Airport Academy
  + Class of 2011
* Sugar Land Citizens Fire Academy
  + Class of 2012

* First Colony Community Services Association
  + Neighborhood Representative 1993 - Date
* Leadership America
  + Class of 1999
* Women’s Energy Network of Houston
  + Past President of the Board of Directors
* Fort Bend Master Gardener
  + Class of 2011
